sentences.sContent: Don’t you have a decent jacket?
sentences.sCn: 你就没有一件像样的外套吗？

sentences.sContent: a house with a decent-sized yard
Their in-flight magazine is halfway decent (= quite good ) .
sentences.sCn: 他们的航班杂志还算可以。

正派；体面；庄重；合乎礼仪；礼貌
